ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question
ygData.msgSnippet: There s a shuttle that goes from a dock in the Elf Compound that takes you to the boat.  You have to be very very patient - it s a LONG wait. Slyde ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
There's a shuttle that goes from a dock in the Elf Compound that takes you
to the boat. You have to be very very patient - it's a LONG wait.

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker [mailto:emeeker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2000 12:20 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Timorous Deep Question




I am not finding info on how you get from Timorous Deep to the rest of
Kunark except via boat, as a bard, IS there a way? Do I have to jump the
boat? Does the trick of getting on the boat from the water work with
Maiden's Voyage?

Colored Curious,
Tsengu
